skdetail:

Invocation Name: two cents
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The hands-free social media skill! 

Post your content INSTANTLY for other users to hear on their devices! You can post content in the skill, hear what others have to say about Trending Topics, and upvote/ downvote posts all using your voice!

For other cool skills visit JumbleQueen.com :)

For feedback, questions or partnerships, please email TDuval@JumbleQueen.com
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
